opened-editors.revealSidebarDesc: Controls whether opened editors reveal in the editor title menu
opened-editors.openedEditorsDesc: Controls whether show opened editors in the editor title menu
opened-editors.copyFileNameDesc: Controls whether the copy file name in the editor title menu
opened-editors.copyFolderNameDesc: Controls whether the copy folder name in the editor title menu
opened-editors.fileTreeExcludeDesc: Configure glob patterns for excluding files and folders.
opened-editors.fileTreeExportTypeDesc: The generated format, `markdown` or `txt` plain text
opened-editors.fileTreeHasBeenCopied: The file tree has been copied to the clipboard :)
